content:
@Grahame Grieve I added a package-list.json file to the root of the github repo for the davinci-hrex IG. The github repo is davinci-ehrx...this is one of the ones where the repo name does not match the cannonical URL because the working groups changed the name after we created the repositories.

Can you push the package-list.json file to the hrex cannonical URL?

http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-hrex

I need to add that IG as a dependency to two other davinci IGs, as they are all being developed simultaneously, with davinci-hrex containing shared profiles and dependencies used by the other IGs.
